Sales Order No.: {{ doc.name }} Date: {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transaction_date) }}

Quotation Reference: {{ doc.items[0].prevdoc_docname }} dated {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.db.get_value("Quotation", doc.items[0].prevdoc_docname, "transaction_date")) }} {%- endif -%}

Customer PR No. / Date : {{ doc.po_no }} / {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.po_date) }}

 

Ms. {{ doc.customer_name }}

Telephone/Fax # {{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer_name, "telephone_and_fax") }}

{{ frappe.db.get_value("Customer", doc.customer_name, "location") }}

 

Subject: {{ doc.title }}

 

 

Dear Sir/Madam,

 

{%- if doc.sales_order_header_text -%} {{ doc.sales_order_header_text }} {%- endif -%}

 

{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
Sl.No Material code Material Name Unit Qty Rate (Nu) Amount (Nu)

{{ row.idx }}

{{ row.item_code }}

{{ row.item_name }}

{{ row.stock_uom }}

{{ row.qty }}

{{ frappe.format_value(row.rate, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}

{{ frappe.format_value(row.amount, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}

 

{%- if doc.additional_cost_or_discount_description -%} {{ doc.additional_cost_or_discount_description }} {%- endif -%}

{{ frappe.format_value(doc.discount_amount * -1, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}

 

Total

{{ frappe.format_value(doc.grand_total, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }}
